origin.anotherworldsorigin.patricia.name: Patricia
origin.anotherworldsorigin.patricia.desc:
An ice warrior who manipulates the power of winter. Specialized in cold climate combat, but vulnerable to heat.

§9Characteristics:§r
• Master of ice abilities
• Enhanced through growth system
• Thrives in cold biomes

§cWarning:§r Vulnerable to fire and heat
power.anotherworldsorigin.ice_resistance: Immune to attack speed reduction and gains power in cold biomes.
Takes increased damage from fire and heat sources.
power.anotherworldsorigin.ice_bloom.name: Ice Bloom
power.anotherworldsorigin.ice_bloom.desc: Creates three ice blooms that deal damage based on attack power.
power.anotherworldsorigin.frost_field.de: Creates a frost field that buffs allies and debuffs enemies.
power.anotherworldsorigin.spreading_fros: Releases expanding frost waves that slow enemies.
layer.origins.patricia.name: Patricia Origins
